TopicTitle: The best way to do map the moon (RSS/SCAN Sat)

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I've recently started playing RSS again thanks to 64 bit support. So my question is what is the best way to map the moon with SCAN sat? Because the Moon is tidally locked I can't just go into a normal polar orbit so do I have to change my inclination every once in a while? Thanks for answering!
Normal polar orbit works fine, it will just take about two weeks to complete the scanning.

Thanks!

I forgot that the moon still rotates a little bit due to the orbit because the last time I went there it felt like I was always passing over the same locations/bimes.
85 Degrees of inclination works fine for me and from 260km covers all the polar region.
